amendment.description: Amendment sought to require that the voters of Hawaii approve the governing documents for the Native Hawaiian governing entity before federal recognition becomes operative.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 1 printed in part B of House Report 111-413, to the amendment in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Abercrombie to require that the voters of Hawaii approve the governing documents for the Native Hawaiian governing entity before federal recognition becomes operative.

action.text: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Hastings (WA) to the Abercrombie amendment (A001).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (WA) amendment (A002) Failed by the Yeas and Nays: 163 - 241 (Roll no. 56).
